message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice.  How about we try a 70/30 split this time?  Consider that the value decreases faster for you with each round.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 40/60 in your favor this time. It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
